subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Vikings’ Adrian Peterson silenced skeptics with his speedy recovery from a knee injury a year ago. Now, he wants to finish his comeback story by breaking Eric Dickerson’s single-season rushing record.
snippet: The Vikings’ Adrian Peterson silenced skeptics with his speedy recovery from a knee injury a year ago. Now, he wants to finish his comeback story by breaking Eric Dickerson’s single-season rushing record.
